name: devops-dashboard-frontend
_comment_proxy: Development proxy - routes API calls to backend server during development
_comment_dependencies: Production dependencies required for the application to run

dependencies._comment_react: Core React library for building user interfaces
dependencies._comment_react-dom: React DOM library for rendering React components in browser
dependencies._comment_react-scripts: Create React App build tools and configuration
dependencies._comment_axios: HTTP client library for making API requests to backend
dependencies._comment_recharts: Charting library for creating interactive data visualizations

_comment_scripts: NPM scripts for development and build tasks

scripts._comment_start: Starts development server with hot reload on port 3000
scripts._comment_build: Creates optimized production build in 'build' folder

_comment_browserslist: Browser compatibility targets for CSS and JS transpilation

browserslist._comment_development: Development: Latest Chrome only for faster builds
